MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hakkari Project in Middle East, Turkey dated March 2010

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hakkari Project in Middle East, Turkey dated March 2010
document.description: This report provides an independent technical analysis of the Hakkari Zinc Project in Turkey, detailing the exploration licenses, geological setting, mineralization, and future recommendations for the project.
